Captain Mouen:
You must be the one my lord has mentioned. There is no time to waste. Great darkness surrounds us all; we must find the 6th seal and stop Shilen as soon as possible.
I was following leads on the Embryo and found out that they call the 6th seal "Punishment." Worse, they've already located it.
Fortunately, they don't know how to undo the seal, but it's only a matter of time. We must stop them! Or else...
It's too terrible to contemplate. Will you help?
